DOC.brief_summary: Compare the efficacy and safety profile of microneedling radiofrequency and that of bipolar radiofrequency treatment for acne scar.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Efficacy Between Fractional Microneedling Radiofrequency and Bipolar Radiofrequency for Acne Scar
DOC.detailed_description: Efficacy and safety of microneedling radiofrequency for acne scar Efficacy and safety bipolar radiofrequency treatment for acne scar compare the efficacy and safety profile of microneedling radiofrequency and that of bipolar radiofrequency treatment for acne scar
DOC.criteria: moderate acne scar mild to moderate acne lesions taking acne medication oral drugs within 2 months topical drugs within 2 weeks taken anu procedures for acne scar within 6 months taking steroid,nonsteroidal antiinflammtory drugs, isotretinoin underlying diabetes mellitus, keloid, or any malignancy
